name: Twitch Team Select
author: Anthony Lester

sections.description: Inserts your Twitch Stream Team roster (names, logos, banners, links) on any page on your wordpress site. As easy as dropping a shortcode on any page.
sections.installation:
Install the plugin

  1. Download and unzip select-twitch-team archive contents to the /wp-content/plugins/select-twitch-team directory or add it using WordPress’ plugin manager.

    1. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.

Configure your team

  1. Go to Twitch Team Select

    1. Enter the name in lowercase of the team you want to use with the plugin.

    2. Click Save Changes use the Show Team button to populate Team Preview section.

Add shortcode

=

Go to any page and open text editor insert [twitch_team_select] that’s it.
sections.faq:
You must first add your team in the plugin’s settings page. Then, you will be able to use the shortcode [twitch_team_select] on any page.

Installation Instructions

Install the plugin

  1. Download and unzip select-twitch-team archive contents to the /wp-content/plugins/select-twitch-team directory or add it using WordPress’ plugin manager.

    1. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.

Configure your team

  1. Go to Twitch Team Select

    1. Enter the name in lowercase of the team you want to use with the plugin.

    2. Click Save Changes use the Show Team button to populate Team Preview section.

Add shortcode

=

Go to any page and open text editor insert [twitch_team_select] that’s it.
